inst_mem[0] = 32'b000000000000_00000_011_00011_0000011; // ld x3, 0(x0)
inst_mem[1] = 32'b0100000_00100_00011_000_00110_0110011; // sub x6 x3 x4
inst_mem[2] = 32'b0000000_00110_00010_000_00111_0110011; // add  x7 x2 x6
inst_mem[8] = 32'b0000000_00001_00010_101_00111_1111111;  //exit


inst_mem[0] = 32'b0000000_00110_00010_000_00111_0110011; // add  x7 x2 x6
inst_mem[1] = 32'b000000000111_00000_011_00000_0100011; // sd x7, 0(x0)
